titleStmt.title: The excellent woman a sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs. Elizabeth Scott ... on the 16 of Decemb. 1658 / by Tho. Case ...
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.

notesStmt.note: "Several letters from divers ministers concerning the life and death of Mistresse Elizabeth Scott"--132 p. at end.
Imperfect: pages tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
